alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 15 at 2:29PM CDT until October 16 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 to 35 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Jewell and Mitchell Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While temperatures may briefly dip to freezing around dawn Monday morning, widespread and persistent sub-freezing temperatures are unlikely. Thus, the reason for the change from Freeze Warning to Frost Advisory for these areas.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
